synonyms.synonym: Bone marrow tyrosine kinase gene in chromosome X protein

protein.specific_function: Activity is required for interleukin 6 (IL-6) induced differentiation. May play a role in the growth and differentiation of hematopoietic cells. May be involved in signal transduction in endocardial and arterial endothelial cells

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity

reference.reference_text: Tamagnone L, Lahtinen I, Mustonen T, Virtaneva K, Francis F, Muscatelli F, Alitalo R, Smith CI, Larsson C, Alitalo K: BMX, a novel nonreceptor tyrosine kinase gene of the BTK/ITK/TEC/TXK family located in chromosome Xp22.2. Oncogene. 1994 Dec;9(12):3683-8.

Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1998 Mar 31;95(7):3644-9.
